message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DB, cs.SE, cs.Distributed Systems. 

Reasoning: The paper discusses a platform for distributed data analytics for connected vehicles, which involves processing large amounts of data on resource-constrained devices. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Databases (cs.DB), Software Engineering (cs.SE), and Distributed Systems (cs.DS). However, given the focus on distributed data analytics and the use of Erlang/OTP for message-passing infrastructure, cs.DC and cs.NI are the most likely categories. The paper also discusses the scalability and efficiency of the platform, which further supports the relevance of cs.DC and cs.NI.
